record.title: ORDER OF PROCEDURE

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, we have 30 minutes on the Republican side. I would like to proceed to use probably most of that. I may not use all of it.

record.chair: There is a unanimous consent agreement that speakers are limited to 10 minutes each.

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent to proceed for a longer period of time.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
